product_name: REI Merino Wool Hiking Socks - Women's - 2012 Seconds
long_description: The REI Merino Wool hiking socks will keep your feet nice and comfortable on long hikes. Supersoft merino wool provides enhanced moisture-wicking performance and itch-free comfort. Mesh-knit ventilation panels over insteps enhance airflow and moisture movement. Elastic arch bands hold socks in place and promote circulation. Soft padding underfoot cushions your steps; padded insteps relieve pressure from laces. Lin Toe(R) ''no feel'' seams eliminate irritation and chafing at toes. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The REI Merino Wool hiking socks will keep your feet nice and comfortable on long hikes.
